channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0414; 08:54AM; 7215 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/45Z4Sue; Sun Valley; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving 34 firefighters (additional resources canceled enroute) extinguished the fire in 25 minutes with no injuries reported. A primary and secondary search found no occupants inside the structure. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E239 E260 E278 E289 E298 E60 E77 E88 E89 EM14 RA81 RA889 RA89 T39 T78 T89 T98; CH9; 12 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0414; 08:45AM; 11700 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SmWrps; North Hollywood; Additional resources requested and are enroute, raising this to a Greater Alarm structure fire. Firefighters performed extensive forcible entry and now have heavy fire towards the back of the building and the truck companies are conducting vertical ventilation. No injuries reported at this time. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E239 E260 E278 E289 E60 E77 E89 EM14 RA889 RA89 T39 T78 T89 E88 LF98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0414; 08:29AM; 11700 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SmWrps; North Hollywood; One story (approximately 50' x 70') commercial building with smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E239 E260 E289 E60 E89 RA889 RA89 T39 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0780; 11:53AM; 2651 N Pasadena Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OE34Pz; #LincolnHeights; *Corrected Address* A small (432 sq-ft) vacant house (built in 1949) with excessive storage had fire inside, which was mostly contained to the attic. It took 22 firefighters 12 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E16 E201 E202 E4 RA4 RA801 SO1 SQ21 T1 T12 T2; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0780; 11:41AM; 2687 N Pasadena Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QAPT5l; #LincolnHeights; Vacant single-family home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E16 E201 E202 E4 RA4 RA801 SQ21 T1 T12 T2; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0357; 07:36AM; 438 W 14th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FAJEbk; #SanPedro; Fire in a tree to the rear of a home quickly spread to exterior storage, to the house, and then to two adjacent buildings (2-story duplex, and an apartment). It took 52 firefighters 48 minutes to extinguish the flames. One patient was evaluated by paramedics, but found to be in good condition and required no hospital transport. No firefighter injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 BC13 BC4 BC6 CM20 CM22 E101 E112 E205 E238 E248 E266 E285 E36 E40 E48 E5 E85 E95 EM6 HR3 RA112 RA848 RA85 SQ95 T38 T48 T5 T66 T85 UR5 UR85 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0357; 06:48AM; 424 W 14th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FAJEbk; #SanPedro; Two-story duplex and adjacent home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 BC13 BC4 BC6 CM20 CM22 E101 E112 E205 E238 E248 E266 E285 E36 E40 E48 E5 E85 E95 EM6 HR3 RA112 RA848 RA85 SQ95 T38 T48 T5 T66 T85 UR5 UR85 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1970; 10:13PM; 3548 W Stocker St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MntVAi; #LeimertPark; Two-story vacant duplex, over parking, with fire showing. An auto fire in the rear exposed the structure to flames. The first 32 firefighters extinguished the flames in 20 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E226 E26 E266 E294 E34 E46 E68 EM11 RA834 RA94 T26 T66 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Physical Rescue; INC#1824; 09:24PM; WB 10 Fwy x Cloverfield Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/45LIjcx; #SantaMonica; LAFD and SMFD responded to the rollover with one trapped patient. Crews extricated the patient and transported the approximately 35-year-old male in moderate condition. CHP Log #3221. Nothing further.; FS 125; Batt 22; Council District outside city; BC18 E237 E292 E43 E59 EM14 HR3 RA59 RA92 T37 T92; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1824; 08:24PM; WB 10 Fwy x Cloverfield Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Sk72l0; #Sawtelle; Two-vehicle collision (with rollover). Firefighters working to extricate one trapped patient.; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; E292 E59 RA92 T92; CH4; Nicholas Prange
